name: What's an EDR?
description: EDR stands for Entity-Relationship Diagram. An EDR is a graphical representation of the data model for a database.

name: ORM is what now?
email: ORMs (Object-Relational Mappers) can simplify database management by providing a higher level of abstraction and reducing the amount of repetitive boilerplate code, ultimately resulting in increased productivity.

name: Handlebars.js: Simplify Your Web Development Workflow
email: Handlebars.js is a popular templating engine that allows developers to create dynamic HTML pages with ease, using a simple syntax and straightforward logic that can be easily integrated into existing web development workflows.
